Welcome to our channel, where a haircut turns into a real art of relaxation! Feel the atmosphere of a real barbershop and enjoy ASMR from our masters. Watch how the scissors easily and gently create masterpieces on your hair, taking you to a world of calm and pleasant sensations. 💈

You can follow us on Instagram 
@simplystanislav ✅


SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, SHARE and press the NOTIFY BELL 🤝.

We hope you like our channel, we try to improve our skills every day and share quality content with people who love this craft. If you are not yet SUBSCRIBED, please click the button.
